verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:6
verses.text: Keep therefore and do them; for this is your wisdom and your understanding in the sight of the nations, which shall hear all these statutes, and say, Surely this great nation is a wise and understanding people.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:7
verses.text: For what nation is there so great, who hath God so nigh unto them, as the Lord our God is in all things that we call upon him for?

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:8
verses.text: And what nation is there so great, that hath statutes and judgments so righteous as all this law, which I set before you this day?
